scripts.build:css: sass assets-src/sass/main.scss --quiet | postcss --use autoprefixer cssnano --no-map > assets/css/main.css
scripts.dev:css: chokidar assets-src/sass/**.scss assets-src/sass/**/*.scss --initial --command 'sass assets-src/sass/main.scss --quiet | postcss --use autoprefixer --no-map > assets/css/main.css'
